title: Wuhan Institute Of Virology â€“ Epicentre Of Coronavirus
content:
The source of the novel coronavirus that has led to the lockdown of 34 Chinese cities, and has now spread to 35 countries outside China, is still unknown. Initial reports from China claimed the source was a live food market in Wuhan, the capital of Hubei Province, and may have been caused by bats. Other reports claimed the source of Coronavirus may have been the state-run Wuhan Institute of Virology near the market, where the virus may have been leaked from the countryâ€™s first top-level â€œP4â€ lab, which handles the most dangerous types of pathogens.
EXCLUSIVE:Â Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It (watch hereÂ Visualizing The Secret History Of Coronavirus)
Watch the exclusive interview ofÂ Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle on Coronavirus Biological WarfareÂ blocked by theÂ Deep State
The original report making the claim about the P4 lab as a potential source was published byÂ GreatGameIndia, a journal on geopolitics and international relations in its report Coronavirus Bioweapon. Other publications, such as The Washington Times, followed, with additional claims based onÂ interviews.
While the narrative of the virus coming from the lab hasnâ€™t been debunked, it has been criticized by several news outlets, since some of the connections still arenâ€™t proven.
Regardless of where the coronavirus came from, the attention on the P4 lab has focused a spotlight on the Chinese regimeâ€™s alleged biological warfare program and is raising questions about the nature of the P4 lab in Wuhan.
The main argument against the idea that the Chinese regime has a biological warfare program is the fact that China became a state party to the Biological Weapons Convention (BWC) in 1984, which would forbid it from developing biological weapons.
EXCLUSIVE#Coronavirus Bioweapon Thread
How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized Ithttps://t.co/tc7W2DrmAA
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) January 27, 2020

A brief perusal of official documents and strategies, however, quickly fuels doubt about how closely the Chinese regime has followed the BWC. A U.S. State DepartmentÂ report from August 2019 notes the U.S. assessment that China had an offensive biological weapons program from at least the 1950s to the late 1980s, and despite signing the BWC, â€œthere is no available information to demonstrate that China took steps to fulfill its treaty obligationsâ€ to â€œdivert or destroyâ€ any offensive biological weapons it previously developed.
The report also notes that the Chinese regime â€œengaged during the reporting period in biological activities with potential dual-use applications, which raises concerns regarding its compliance with the BWC.â€
In other words, some research programs done by the Chinese regime could be used for both peaceful and hostile purposes. The report notes, â€œAvailable information on studies from researchers at Chinese military medical institutions often identify biological activities of a possibly anomalous nature â€¦ with potential dual-use applications.â€
Rick Fisher, a senior fellow at the International Assessment and Strategy Center and an Epoch Times contributor, said in an interview that U.S. assessments in the government and intelligence communities hold that â€œChina has been developing these weapons all along.â€
Fisher noted that it was suspected that biological warfare program in China were connected to leakages of the SARS virus, following its outbreak in 2002 and 2003, and to a viral outbreak in the late 1980s in Xinjiang.
â€œThey are still disastersâ€”breakdownsâ€”in the process of these laboratories that allowed for these very harmful viruses to leak out into the public and cause extensive, but clearly unnecessary, death,â€ Fisher said.
The P4 lab in Wuhan has connections to the Chinese military, the Peopleâ€™s Liberation Army.Â When the U.S.-based company Gilead Sciences recently sent a new drug (remdesivir) to China that could possibly treat the novel coronavirus, the Wuhan Institute of Virology quickly moved to apply for a patent.
In a Feb. 4Â statementÂ published on the instituteâ€™s website about the patent, the institute notes it conducted research alongside the National Academy of Military Medical Research Institute of Emergency Medicine for Prevention and Control of Drugs. It also notes ties to the Prevention Engineering Technology Research Center of Military Medical Research Institute, and to the National Institute of Emergency Medicine Control and Engineering Research Center for Military Medical Research.
The Wuhan P4 lab isÂ part of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, which has close ties to the Chinese military in its research programs.
Meanwhile, Chinese military doctrine has identified biological warfare as a key part of the regimeâ€™s military strategiesâ€”particularly in any war scenarios with the United States. Among the key programs is its Assassinâ€™s Mace (â€œSha Shou Jianâ€) strategy.
Michael Pillsbury, a Pentagon consultant,Â warnedÂ of the strategy in his 2016 book â€œThe Hundred-Year Marathon,â€ in which he noted the only time China won in a simulated war game with the United States, the China team used the Assassinâ€™s Mace strategy. He wrote, â€œwhenever the China team used conventional tactics and strategies, America wonâ€”decisively. However, in every case where China employed Assassinâ€™s Mace methods, China was the victor.â€
Fisher said that Assassinâ€™s Mace is designed around using various unconventional weapons in conjunction for a brutal surprise attack, and that â€œwhen used at the right time, and targeted against a specific weakness of the enemy, can result in the rapid collapse of that enemyâ€™s military threat.â€
He also noted that Chinese military officials havenâ€™t shied away from discussing the use of brutal attacks and weapons, including biological weapons. Some of the statements are so brazen and extreme, however, that many in the U.S. defense analyst community tend to dismiss them.
In regard to rumors about the new coronavirus spreading in China, he noted that while theyâ€™re still unproven, they also shouldnâ€™t be written off without some investigation.

â€œReputable scientists are beginning to coalesce around the idea that at a minimum, the coronavirus that weâ€™re facing today is the product of a laboratory [and] not the product of some kind of naturally occurring process,â€ Fisher said.
He said the â€œdeveloping consensus that this coronavirus is a man-made virus naturally links this to Chinaâ€™s biowarfare capabilities and programs.â€
â€œThe world should take this as a very serious possibility, and it should affect our policy and relationships with the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China.â€

title: Frank Plummer â€“ Canadian Scientist Key To Coronavirus Investigation Assassinated In Africa?
content:
In a very strage turn of events, renowned scientist Frank Plummer who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample and was working on Coronavirus (HIV) vaccine in the Winnipeg based Canadian lab from where the virus was smuggled by Chinese Biowarfare agents and weaponized as revealed inÂ GreatGameIndia investigation, has died in mysterious conditions. According to CBC, Plummer, 67,Â was in Kenya,Â where he wasÂ a keynote speaker at the annual meeting of the University of Nairobiâ€™s collaborative centre for research and training in HIV/AIDS/STIs.
Dr. Larry Gelmon, who helped set up that meeting, said Plummer collapsed and was taken to hospital in Nairobi, where he was pronounced dead on arrival.
No confirmed cause of death has yet been released.
Plummer was born and raised in Winnipeg, where heÂ headed upÂ Canadaâ€™s National Microbiology Laboratory for several years.
He was also involved in an innovative research partnership between the University of Manitoba and the University of Nairobi, established before the world was very aware of HIV/AIDS.
â€œHe helped to identify a lot of the key factors that are involved in HIV transmission in the early days,â€ said Keith Fowke, a professor in the medical microbiology and infectious diseases department at the University of Manitoba.
â€œHe was so hopeful that he was on the path that would end with discovery of the HIV vaccine â€” the road he had started down almost 30 years ago,â€ said Plummerâ€™s colleague, Dr. Allan Ronald.
What is not mentioned in the CBC report however is that Plummer worked in the same National Microbiology Laboratory (NML) in Winnipeg, Canada from where Chinese Biowarfare agent Xiangguo Qiu and her colleagues smuggled SARS Coronavirus to Chinaâ€™s Wuhan Institute of Virology where it is believed to have been weaponized and leaked.

The Canadian lab grew up stocks of the virus and used it to assess diagnostic tests being used in Canada. Winnipeg scientists worked to see which animal species can be infected with the new virus.
Research was done in conjunction with the Canadian Food Inspection Agencyâ€™s national lab, the National Centre for Foreign Animal Diseases which is housed in the same complex as the National Microbiology Laboratory.

Although it should be noted that now China has started using HIV vaccine to cure Coronavirus.

title: TRANSCRIPT: Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle On Coronavirus
content:
A recent interview with Bioweapons expert Dr. Francis Boyle published by GreatGameIndia and conducted by Geopolitics & Empire, has been exploding across the world the past few days as the truth is emerging on the origins of the Coronavirus Bioweapon.

Bush.
EXCLUSIVE:Â Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It (watch hereÂ Visualizing The Secret History Of Coronavirus)
Watch the exclusive interview ofÂ Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle on Coronavirus Biological WarfareÂ blocked by theÂ Deep State
In the exclusive interview, Dr. Boyle touches uponÂ GreatGameIndiaâ€˜s exclusive reportÂ Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ where we reported in detail how Chinese Biowarfare agents working at the Canadian lab in Winnipeg were involved in the smuggling of Coronavirus to Wuhanâ€™s lab from where it is believed to have been leaked.
In this bombshell interview (full transcript below), Boyle talks about:

How the Deep State deployed anthrax on US soil to whip up publicity about biological weapons and increase funding for bioweapons labs
Why the WHO and CDC are both criminal organizations which are complicit in the covert development of biological weapons
The â€œdeath scienceâ€ industry and why the US government has spent over $100 billion developing self-replicating weapons

Why all BSL-3 and BSL-4 labs in the world should be banned and shut down.
Full transcript
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Geopolitics & Empire is joined by Dr. Francis Boyle, who is international law professor at the University of Illinois. Weâ€™ll be discussing the Wuhan coronavirus and biological warfare. Heâ€™s served as counsel to numerous governments such as Bosnia and Herzegovina and the Palestinian authority. Heâ€™s represented numerous national international bodies in the areas of human rights, war crimes and genocide, nuclear policy, and biowarfare. Heâ€™s written numerous books, one of my favorites being â€œDestroying Libya and World Orderâ€, which I assigned as mandatory reading material for my own students when I taught at the Monterrey Institute of Technology.
But most important for this interview, heâ€™s written a book called â€œBiowarfare and Terrorismâ€, and drafted the US domestic implementing legislation for the biological weapons convention, known as the Biological Weapons Anti-Terrorism Act of 1989 that was approved unanimously by both houses of the US Congress and signed into law by President Bush. Thanks for joining us, Dr. Boyle.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Wow. Thank you so much for having me on and thanks for that kind introduction.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â  Now letâ€™s get to whatâ€™s been on the news recently. This coronavirus in Wuhan. There have been some reports recently, thereâ€™s a really interesting website called GreatGameIndia that has been reporting on this. Theyâ€™ve been talking about China, which they say has been complying with biological weapons convention in recent years.

â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) January 27, 2020

But then there are some people in the US and experts that have been saying that in reality, China isnâ€™t complying with the weapons convention. And I think neither, perhaps the US as well. Iâ€™m wondering if China is developing its own biosafety level four lab in Wuhan and elsewhere, as you know, as a type of deterrence. Is it a type of a biological arms race that we have going on?
You told me in an email that you suspect China was developing the coronavirus as a dual use of biowarfare weapons agent. Also, what do you make of reports that Chinese scientists have been stealing research and viruses, including the coronavirus from a Canadian bio lab this past December?
And as well, Chinese nationals have been charged with smuggling vials of biological research to China from the US with the aid of Charles Lieber who was the chair of Harvardâ€™s chemistry department. And he also happens to be in 2011 a strategic scientist at Wuhan University. So, can you tell us whatâ€™s going on with this recent outbreak in Wuhan?
Dr. Francis Boyle: Well, thatâ€™s a lot of questions. I guess we can take them one at a time, but if you just do a very simple Google search on â€œDoes China have a BSL-4 laboratory?â€, Wuhan comes up right away. Itâ€™s at the top of the list. Thatâ€™s all with the moment this type of thing happened I began to do that. So a BSL-4 is the most serious type. And basically BSL-4 labs, we have many of them here in the United States, are used to develop offensive biological warfare weapons with DNA genetic engineering.
So it does seem to me that the Wuhan BSL-4 is the source of the coronavirus. My guess is that they were researching SARS, and they weaponize it further by giving it a gain of function properties, which means it could be more lethal.
Indeed, the latest report now is itâ€™s a 15% fatality rate, which is more than SARS at 83% infection rate. A typical gain of function travels in the air so it could reach out maybe six feet or more from someone emitting a sneeze or a cough. Likewise, this is a specially designated WHO research lab. The WHO was in on it and they knew full well what was going on there.
Yes. Itâ€™s also been reported that Chinese scientists stole coronavirus materials from the Canadian lab at Winnipeg. Winnipeg is Canadaâ€™s formal center for research, developing, testing, biological warfare weapons. Itâ€™s along the lines of Fort Detrick here in the United States of America. I have three degrees from Harvard. It would not surprise me if something was being stolen out of Harvard to turn over to China. I read that report. I donâ€™t know what was in those vials one way or the other.
But the bottom line is I drafted the US domestic implementing legislation for the Biological Weapons Convention that was approved unanimously by both Houses in the United States Congress signed into law by President Bush Sr. that it appearsÂ the coronavirus that weâ€™re dealing with here is an offensive biological warfare weapon that leaped out of Wuhan BSL-4. Iâ€™m not saying it was done deliberately. But there had been previous reports of problems with that lab and things leaking out of it. Iâ€™m afraid that is what we are dealing with today.
#FrankPlummer â€“ renowned Winnipeg based Canadian National Microbiology Laboratory scientist key to #Coronavirus investigation has died in mysterious conditions in Africa. He was the one who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample which was smuggled to Wuhanhttps://t.co/VjvQMURTyT
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) February 6, 2020

Geopolitics and Empire:Â Weâ€™ll be talking about the Wuhan and the coronavirus and China, but can you give us kind of like a bigger context. I know youâ€™ve, previously, in interviews said that since 9/11, you think thatÂ the US has spent $100 billion on biological warfare research. We know the Soviet Union, if Iâ€™m not mistaken, developed anthrax as a bioweapon. And youâ€™ve also mentioned that UK, France, Israel and China are all involved in biological warfare weapons research.
And something interesting, I believe one or two years ago a Bulgarian journalist and the Russian government shared their concern of the discovery of a US bioweapons lab in the country of Georgia. Youâ€™ve commented how in Africa, US has set up bioweapons labs to work on Ebola, which I think is illegal under international law. But they were allowed somehow to put those in Africa. Can you give us like a bigger picture? Whatâ€™s going on with these different countries and whatâ€™s the purpose of this research?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â All these BSL-4 labs are by United States, Europe, Russia, China, Israel are all there to research, develop, test biological warfare agents.Â Thereâ€™s really no legitimate scientific reason to have BSL-4 labs. That figure I gave $100 billion, that was about 2015 I believe. I had crunched the numbers and came up with that figure the United States since 9/11.
To give you an idea thatâ€™s as much in constant dollars as the US spent to develop the Manhattan Project and the atom bomb. So itâ€™s clearly all weapons related.Â We have well over 13,000 alleged life science scientists involved in research developed testing biological weapons here in the United States. Actually this goes back it even precedes 9/11 2001.
I have another book, The Future of International Law and American Foreign Policy, tracing that all the way back to the Reagan administration under the influence of the neocons and they got very heavily involved in research development testing of biological weapons with DNA genetic engineers. It was because of that I issued my plea in 1985 in a Congressional briefing sponsored by the Council for Responsible Genetics, Iâ€™m a lawyer for them. Theyâ€™re headquartered in Cambridge, Mass. All the MIT, Harvard people are involved in that, the principal ones. And then they asked me to draft the implementing legislation.
The implementing legislation that I drafted was originally designed to stop this type of work. â€œDeath science workâ€, I call it, â€œby the United States governmentâ€. After 9/11, 2001, it just completely accelerated. My current figure, that last figure a 100 billion. I havenâ€™t had a chance to re-crunch the numbers because I just started classes. But you have to add in about another 5 billion per year.
Basically, this is offensive biological weapons raised by the United States government and with its assistance in Canada and Britain.Â And so other States, the world have responded accordingly including Russia and China. They were going to set up a whole series of BSL-4 facilities as well. And you know Wuhan was the first. It backfired on them.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Would you basically consider what happened and Wuhan and just boil it down to ineptitude or incompetence on the Chinese part?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Well, itâ€™s criminality. It does appear they stole something there from Winnipeg. This activity that they engaged in clearly violates the Biological Weapons Convention. Research development of biological weapons these days is an international crime, the use of it would be. That was criminal.
Iâ€™m not saying they deliberately inflicted this on their own people, but it leaked out of there and all these BSL-4 facilities leak. Everyone knows that who studies this. So this was a catastrophe waiting to happen. Unfortunately, it happened. The Chinese government under Xi and his comrades there have been covering this up from the get-go. The first reported case was December 1, so theyâ€™d been sitting on this until they couldnâ€™t anymore. And everything theyâ€™re telling you is a lie. Itâ€™s propaganda.
The WHO still refuses to declare a global health emergency. It said Tedros was over there shaking hands with Xi and smiling and yanking it up. The WHO was in on it. Theyâ€™ve approved many of these BSL-4 labs., they know exactly whatâ€™s going on and that is a WHO research-approved laboratory. They know whatâ€™s going on too.Â You canâ€™t really believe anything the WHO is telling you about this, either theyâ€™re up to their eyeballs in it, in my opinion.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Iâ€™d probably agree with you that this outbreak in Wuhan was an accidental leak from the laboratory. But just your thoughts, itâ€™s happening at quite an opportune time because namely weâ€™re smack in the middle of a US-China new Cold War, which is currently characterized by economic warfare such as the trade war among other forms of hybrid and technological warfare. And it seems the Wuhan outbreak will likely hit the Chinese economy hard. The Chinese are flat out dismissing any idea that the US is involved in. Like I said, itâ€™s probably they made the mistakes in the Wuhan lab. What are your thoughts of any seemingly, this would benefit the USâ€¦
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â When the outbreak occurred, of course I considered that alternative too. When you have an outbreak, youâ€™re never quite sure who or what is behind it.Â It certainly isnâ€™t bats, thatâ€™s ridiculous.Â They made the same argument on Ebola in West Africa. I demolished that online. You can check it out. So I kept competing theories about this.
But right now, when you originally contacted me, I said I wasnâ€™t prepared to comment because I was weighing the evidence. Iâ€™m a law professor and a lawyer,Â  I try to do the best I can to weigh the evidence. But right now, the Wuhan BSL-4 in my opinion is the most likely source, apply Occamâ€™s razor, the simplest explanation. Iâ€™m not ruling out some type of sabotage. But right now, I believe that is the source here.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â And you mentioned WHO. Iâ€™d like to just get your thoughts on the WHO and the Big Pharma. Thereâ€™s also some analysts who are downplaying this news media hype of the coronavirus. Youâ€™ve just said that it seems to be lethal, but if we go back a decade to the 2009 swine flu, which I believe didnâ€™t have too many casualties, but I think profited greatly the pharmaceutical companies. If I recall that back in 2009,Â many countries purchased great stocks of the vaccines and they ended up not using anywhere from 50 to 80% of the vaccines that they purchased. 
Youâ€™ve previously stated in an interview that the World Health Organization is a front for Big Pharma if Iâ€™m not mistaken. Robert F. Kennedy Jr. also agrees and he says, you know, 50% of WHO funding comes from pharmaceutical companies. And that the CDC itself is also severely compromised.Â What are your thoughts on the WHO? The CDC?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Canâ€™t trust anything the WHO says because theyâ€™re all bought and paid for by Big Pharma and when they work in cahoots with the CDC, which is the United States government, they work in cahoots with Fort Detrick, so you canâ€™t trust any of it.
However, the swine flu and yes, I agree pharma made a lot of money, but that swine flu which I looked at it,Â it did seem to me to be a genetically modified biological warfare weapon. It was a chimera of three different types of genetic strains that someone put it together in a cocktail. Fortunately, it was not as lethal as all of us fear. So fine. But as I said, this figure I just gave to you was Saturday from Lancet, which is a medical publication, saying itâ€™s a 15% fatality rate and an 83% infection rate. So itâ€™s quite serious, I think, far more serious than the swine flu.
As for big pharma, sure theyâ€™re all trying to profit off this today as we speak. There was a big article yesterday in the Wall Street Journal, all big pharma trying to peddle whatever they can over there in China even if itâ€™s worthless and wonâ€™t help. We do know, if you read the mainstream news media they say there isnâ€™t a vaccine.
Well, there is, itâ€™s by the Pirbright Institute in Britain thatâ€™s tied into their biological warfare program over there.Â They were behind the hoof and mouth disease outbreak over there that wiped out their cattle herd and it leaked out of there. So itâ€™s clear theyâ€™re working on a hoof and mouth biological warfare weapon, but the vaccine is there. I have the patent for it here, I havenâ€™t had a chance to read the patent itâ€™s about 25 pages long and my classes just resume. So eventually, I get some free time and Iâ€™ll read the patent.
You canâ€™t patent a vaccine with the United States patent office unless the science is there. So there is a vaccine. Everyoneâ€™s lying about that, no oneâ€™s pointing this out â€“ thereâ€™s a vaccine but instead big pharma wants to make money and the researchers say, well, itâ€™ll take three months and weâ€™re racing forward, you know. Everyoneâ€™s gonna make a buck off of this, thatâ€™s for sure. But there is a vaccine, I have the patent here. Itâ€™s been patented by the United States government.
So obviously, I donâ€™t know exactly how workable it is, but itâ€™s a vaccine. I donâ€™t know why it isnâ€™t out there now? Why isnâ€™t someone saying there is a vaccine? Perhaps political leaders have already been vaccinated for all I know, I really donâ€™t know.Â  But there is a vaccine, Pirbright is well known there in Britain and itâ€™s tied into Fort Detrick and CDC is tied into Fort Detrick too. So they all know thereâ€™s a patented vaccine.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â  And just to get your comment on, I mean, something to related to this, which was my next question. So I think, Iâ€™m not sure if itâ€™s that same Institute that you just mentioned that has the patent.Â  I read somewhere that the Bill & Melinda Gates foundation maybe funds or has some connection to that Institute that has the patent.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  I think they do.Â The Bill & Melinda Gates information, they fund this type of DNA genetically engineered biological warfare work. Thatâ€™s correct. So you canâ€™t trust anything theyâ€™re telling you that somehow theyâ€™re out there trying to make the world a better place.Â  I mean, we have Bill Gates publicly admitting that the world be a better place if there were a lot less people. So the Bill & Melinda Gates foundation, they are wolves in sheepâ€™s clothing and they are funding this type of stuff.Â Sure.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â And just your comment, there was also the report that I guess it was a consortium of companies which included the Gates foundation that back in just two or three months ago in October of 2019 they held a pandemic exercise simulating an outbreak. I mean, what are the chances specifically of a coronavirus and it was called events 201. People can find this online online and they gave a list of seven recommendations for governments and international organizations to take. I also find that kind of interesting how they had this simulation.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  Thatâ€™s correct. It raises that question,Â  the origins of what happened here.Â  But right now, Iâ€™m just looking at the evidence I have and applying Occamâ€™s razor and we know that Wuhan BSL-4 was research developing, testing, SARS as a biological warfare agent. So it could have been, they gave it this DNA genetic engineering enhanced properties gain of function which we do here in the West, in the United States all the time.Â We haveÂ  all sorts of research that is clearly a bio warfare research that has beenÂ  approved by the National Institutes of Health, itâ€™s a joke. They know full well they are proving all kinds of biological warfare research and it gets funded by the United States government.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â  And youâ€™ve also mentioned in the email to me that what happened in the biosafety lab level 4 in Wuhan calls into question the safety of all of these level 3and 4four labs around the world.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Â Theyâ€™re complete unsafe. BSL-3 and BSL-4 lab are only designed for research development testing of offense of biological warfare agents.Â  In my opinion, they serve no legitimate purpose at all. They should all be shut down, every one of them.Â Even assuming, theyâ€™re simply too dangerous. Geopolitics and Empire:Â  Yeah, I was just watching that documentary before we connected and I recommend the listeners go check that out. Do you see, in the future, any countries,Â  if we come to a conflict between US, EU, Israel, Saudi Arabia, Iran, China, Russia,Â  I mean you name it. Do you think that thereâ€™s a real danger of this escalating?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â For sure. Thatâ€™s the only reason they develop these biological weapons to eventually be used, sure.Â  I mean, itâ€™s like the Manhattan project, we put all that money into developing an atom bomb and even though it was not needed to end world war II they still knew Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Yes, they can be used as the eyes for the United States government, today they are fully prepared, armed, equipped, supplied to wage a biological warfare with anthrax.
These other more exotic things I donâ€™t know, but they have the weapons, there are stockpiles. We have to understand if you read Seymour Martin Hershâ€™s book published about 1968, he won the Pulitzer prize, he had the whole offensive US biological warfare industry in there back before it was illegal and criminal.Â Basically after 9/11, 2001, that entire industry â€“ offensive biological warfare industry has been reconstituted here in the United States with all these BSL-4 BSL-3 labs, well over 13,000, alleged scientists sort of like Dr. Mengele working on these things.Â Other countries have responded in kind like Russia, like China, France is involved, Britainâ€™s involved. Sure.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â I just wanted to get your thoughts on, in the last few years there was the Russian double agent spy Sergei Skripal who had been allegedly poisoned with Novichok out in Britain andÂ  I thought it was funny. It just so happened where he was allegedly poisoned, he was right in Porton down the British bio weapons lab, I guess the worldâ€™s first bio weapons lab that was created in 1916. I mean,Â  I donâ€™t know if you have thoughts on that whole incident.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Yeah, I was right down the street from Porton Down, so applying Occamâ€™s razor who you think mightâ€™ve been behind this and it was not a nerve agent. A nerve agent would have killed him immediately. This is Novichok. It was something else like DX or something like that. So fine. But, I would just say that I donâ€™t think that was a coincidence, but, you know, there you go. Thereâ€™s the, obviously thereâ€™s a lot of speculation on that.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Something else thatâ€™s kind of interesting. Youâ€™ve written in bio warfare and terrorism in your book and thereâ€™s also Graeme Macqueen, I think your colleague who wrote the anthrax deception the case for domestic conspiracyâ€¦
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  Everything you said in there. Thatâ€™s correct.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â  Iâ€™m wondering also if this new war for biotechnological dominance, whatever you want to call it, if it can also be used kind of as a pretext for the centralization of political power and the initiation of wars like I guess it did in the 2003 Iraq war. I mean, is this another danger that we get these events like now this coronavirus and then governments will call for a centralization of greater power and taking away some of our civil liberties?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  Sure.Â If you look at the October, 2001 anthrax attacks here in the United States, that was clearly by elements of the United States government that was behind that. That was a super weapons grade anthrax with a trillion spores per gram and it floated in the air solely a very sophisticated biological weapons lab like Fort Detrick could produce that. And they use that anthrax attack including on Congress to brand through the USA Patriot act which basically turned the United States to a police state which is what we have now.Â You have to understand the Pentagon, Fort Dietrich made the dugway proving ground still has a stockpile of that super weapons grade anthrax that we saw in October of 2001 that they can use the next time they want to do something like that to further develop the American police thing. Right.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â  Is there anything else you feel important to mention regarding this Wuhan Coronavirus outbreak or biological warfare or any other thoughts youâ€™d like to leave us with?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Â Well, you just canâ€™t believe anything the Chinese government, the WHO,Â  the CDC are telling. Theyâ€™re all lies because they know whatâ€™s going on hereÂ  and so youâ€™re going to have to figure it out as fast as you can.Â But in my opinion, as of this time and Iâ€™m fully prepared to consider further evidence on this, it does seem to me that this wasÂ  a DNA genetically engineered biological warfare agent leaking out of Wuhan that has gain-of-function properties which can make it more lethal.Â  I think they are probably doing something with SARS to make it a lot more lethal and more infectious. And so for that reason,Â  you have to take extreme precautions and theyâ€™re now finally admitted anyone within six feet can be infected, whereas with SARS that was about two feet. Well, thatâ€™s gaining a function right there and that should be a tip off.
So, I guess youâ€™re gonna have to protect yourself.Â  Laurie Garrett had a pretty good essay in a foreign policy yesterday and she was over there covering the SARS and she has very good advice in there except that she took the SARS figure out two to three feet and saidÂ  well, you gotta stay to two to three. Any orifice, the mouth, maybe the ears, weâ€™re not sure at this point.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Iâ€™m here on the border of China in Kazakhstan and I was just reading yesterday â€“ today that theyâ€™re no longer allowing Chinese citizens into Kazakhstan without a medical paper, a medical check to get their visas to enter Kazakhstan
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  Those medical checks are worthless because this is just public relations by all the governments involved because there is a 14 day incubation period where people can still be infected.Â So someone could walk right through a medical inspection and passing a gate into your country and then they come down with the coronavirus.Â  So thatâ€™s all public relations in my opinion by governments and they know it and theyâ€™re just sending people out there with temperatures and things like that. Itâ€™s not like SARS, this is more dangerous than SARS.Â  As I said, I think that Wuhan lab, we know they had SARS in there that they were dealing with and I think they enhanced it at andÂ  Iâ€™m afraid thatâ€™s what weâ€™re dealing with. But you know, Iâ€™m keeping an open mind as to what other sources that might have and I wasnâ€™t prepared to say anything until that Wuhan lab is right there and itâ€™s dealing with coronavirus. Geopolitics and Empire:Â I guess my, one of my final question would be in the months ahead, apart of what you say staying six feet away from people.Â  Iâ€™ve read taking high doses of vitamin C and other things like this can help you. But, if they come out as the situation develops and if it gets worse and they come out with a coronavirus vaccine,Â  should people take it or not? What are your thoughts?
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â  Well, what I would say is this. Right now, if you look at the article at the Wall Street Journal, big pharma is trying to sell all sorts of â€“ theyâ€™re taking all their drugs off the shelf and say well letâ€™s see if it works. Which is preposterous. Okay. The scientists are saying, well, we can get you a vaccine maybe two to three months but theyâ€™re not tested.Â  So what we do know, however, is that Pirbright vaccine has been patented. So all I can assume is that that might work. But I donâ€™t think Iâ€™d be taking any of these other vaccines. No, you have no idea whatâ€™s in there.Â Youâ€™ll be the Guinea pig for big pharma and everyone figures theyâ€™re gonna make a lot of money here.Â So Iâ€™ll keep my eye open on thisÂ  and how it develop but I wouldnâ€™t trust anything theyâ€™re trying to sell right now. Theyâ€™re just pulling these things off the shelf.
If they do come up with something in two to three months, even thatâ€™s not going to be tested in accordance with normal scientific protocol. So itâ€™s going to be a crap shoot.Â If itâ€™s going to help you, indeed it might not help you because theyâ€™ll be using for this vaccines (these DNA genetic engineered vaccines) theyâ€™ll be using live coronavirus probably and sticking it in there and giving you some live coronavirus on the theory youâ€™ll develop an immunity.Â Thatâ€™s the way a lot of these vaccines worked out, thatâ€™s what happened with the Ebola vaccine that created the Ebola pandemic there in West Africa. They were testing out a vaccine on poor black Africans, as usual, andÂ  this vaccine had live Ebola in it so it gave them Ebola.Â So again, Iâ€™d be very careful even if they do come up with these vaccines two to three months from now, very careful. Why would you want to inject the live coronavirus in you?
Geopolitics and Empire:Â All right. I donâ€™t believe you have a strong online presence. How can people best follow your work? I suppose to search for interviews as well as get your books.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Well, basically Iâ€™m blackballed and blacklisted off all the mainstream news media here on purpose. As far as I can figure out, the US government gave an order that I should not be interviewed by anyone, so Iâ€™m not.Â  I guess you could just put my name in there under Google, Google alert, and some interviews might come up. Biowarfare & Terrorism, you can just get it at amazon.com. That was pretty comprehensive.
Geopolitics and Empire:Â Yeah,Â  I read that as well and Iâ€™ll include the link in the description of this interview so people can go check that out. Youâ€™re not the only academic I know and have heard of others that similar things have happened and thatâ€™s just I guess the price we pay for telling the truth. Again, for listeners, if people wanted to have a broader context and deeper understanding of whatâ€™s happening today especially with biological warfare as well as us foreign policy and international affairs, I urge you to get Dr. Francis Boyleâ€™s books and listen to his interviews as well as his colleagues book. Graeme Macqueen, The Anthrax Deception, The Case For Domestic Conspiracy. Thank you for being with us, Dr. Boyle.
Dr. Francis Boyle:Â Well, thank you and again, please understand these are my current opinions.Â  I could change my opinion here based on more evidence. SoÂ  Iâ€™m just looking at the evidence out there as I see it and you have to understand there is so much disinformation, lies and propaganda that itâ€™s kind of very difficult to distinguish truth from fact.Â  Iâ€™m doing the best job I can here.

title: Coronavirus : India To Investigate Wuhan Institute Of Virology
content:
After Indian scientists were forced to withdraw their study concluding Coronavirus was injected with HIV AIDS virus amidst massive online criticism from Social Media experts, now Indian authorities have launched an investigation against Chinaâ€™s Wuhan Institute of Virology.
EXCLUSIVE:Â Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It (watch hereÂ Visualizing The Secret History Of Coronavirus)
Watch the exclusive interview ofÂ Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle on Coronavirus Biological WarfareÂ blocked by theÂ Deep State
The Indian government has ordered an inquiry into a study conducted in the Northeastern state of Nagaland (close to China) by researchers from the U.S., China and India on bats and humans carrying antibodies to deadly viruses like Ebola, officials confirmed to The Hindu.
The study came under the scanner as two of the 12 researchers belonged to the Wuhan Institute of Virologyâ€™s Department of Emerging Infectious Diseases, and it was funded by the United States Department of Defenseâ€™s Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA). They would have required special permissions as foreign entities.
The study, conducted by scientists of the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, the National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS), the Wuhan Institute of Virology, the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences in the U.S. and the Duke-National University in Singapore, is now being investigated for how the scientists were allowed to access live samples of bats and bat hunters (humans) without due permissions.
#FrankPlummer â€“ renowned Winnipeg based Canadian National Microbiology Laboratory scientist key to #Coronavirus investigation has died in mysterious conditions in Africa. He was the one who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample which was smuggled to Wuhanhttps://t.co/VjvQMURTyT
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) February 6, 2020

The results of the study were published in October last year in the PLOS Neglected Tropical Diseases journal, originally established by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.
Bill Gates, the man who tops the Forbes richest person in the world list had issued a grave warning about a potential Coronavirus-like catastrophe that could kill 30 million people at the Munich Security Conference held in Germany in 2017:
â€œWhether it occurs by a quirk of nature or at the hand of a terrorist, epidemiologists say a fast-moving airborne pathogen could kill more than 30 million people in less than a year. And they say there is a reasonable probability the world will experience such an outbreak in the next 10 to 15 years.â€
â€œThe Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) sent a five-member committee to investigate. The inquiry is complete, and a report has been submitted to the Health Ministry,â€ a senior government official told The Hindu.
The U.S. Embassy and the Union Health Ministry declined to comment on the inquiry. In a written reply to questions from The Hindu, the U.S. Centre for Disease Control (CDC) in Atlanta said it â€œdid not commission this study and had not received any enquiries [from the Indian government] on it.â€ An American official, however, suggested that the U.S. Department of Defense might not have coordinated the study through the CDC.
The study, â€˜Filovirus-reactive antibodies in humans and bats in Northeast India imply Zoonotic spilloverâ€™, published in PLOS Neglected Tropical Diseases states the researchers found â€œthe presence of filovirus (e.g. ebolavirus, marburgvirus and dianlovirus) reactive antibodies in both human (e.g. bat hunters) and bat populations in Northeast India, a region with no historical record of Ebola virus disease.â€
It adds: â€œEbola has posed a global health threat several times, most notably from 2013 to 2016. It is a deadly disease, with a fatality rate of roughly 50 percent.â€ Now, according to health officials, 2019-nCoV, too, has acquired the ability to pass between people and can do so before symptoms appear.
The Nagaland study suggests bats in South Asia act as a reservoir host of a diverse range of filoviruses, and filovirus spillover occurs through human exposure to these bats. For the study done in 2017, 85 individuals participating in an annual bat harvest at Mimi, Nagaland, were picked. The majority of bat hunters were male, aged between 18 and 50, and participated at least eleven times in the harvest. The study says the potential virus present in the bats may not be an exact copy of the virus responsible for various outbreaks.
Given the widespread challenges from the newly discovered viruses, officials say they want to take no chance on their spread and will take action to ensure all medical studies in the country adhere to strict norms.
Indian military believes that the U.S. Center for Disease Control in Atlanta was involved in the 1994 plague in the Indian city of Surat which killed 52 people and close to a quarter of the cityâ€™s citizens fled the area for fear of being quarantined. Even the origin of 1994 plague is mired in controversy to this day.

During the 1994 plague outbreak in Surat and Beed, it was found that the germs had an extra protein ring which could only have been inserted artificially. The US embassy had denied the allegations. There were also reports that the Surat germ could have been developed in a lab in Almaty, Kazakhstan.
Mr. Prasannan is one of many experts from different fields who have raised doubts over the narrative being paddled by certain sections of the media. In retaliation India has launched a full-scale investigation against Chinaâ€™s Wuhan Institute of Virology. The Indian government has ordered an inquiry into a study conducted in the Northeastern state of Nagaland (close to China) by researchers from the U.S., China and India on bats and humans carrying antibodies to deadly viruses like Ebola.
#FrankPlummer â€“ renowned Winnipeg based Canadian National Microbiology Laboratory scientist key to #Coronavirus investigation has died in mysterious conditions in Africa. He was the one who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample which was smuggled to Wuhanhttps://t.co/VjvQMURTyT

The study came under the scanner as two of the 12 researchers belonged to the Wuhan Institute of Virologyâ€™s Department of Emerging Infectious Diseases, and it was funded by the United States Department of Defenseâ€™s Defense Threat Reduction Agency (DTRA).
The study, conducted by scientists of the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, the National Centre for Biological Sciences (NCBS), the Wuhan Institute of Virology, the Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences in the U.S. and the Duke-National University in Singapore, is now being investigated for how the scientists were allowed to access live samples of bats and bat hunters (humans) without due permissions.
The results of the study were published in October last year in theÂ PLOS Neglected Tropical DiseasesÂ journal, originally established by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation.

We must have an investigation of the outbreak in Wuhan. The Chinese must grant the world total transparency. The truth must come out. If Chinese officials are innocent, they have nothing to hide. If they are guilty, they will refuse to cooperate.
The real concern here is whether the rest of the world has the courage to demand a real and thorough investigation. We need to be fearless in this demand and not allow â€œeconomic interestsâ€ to play a coy and dishonest game of denial. We need an honest inquiry. We need it now.

title: Coronavirus â€“ Chinaâ€™s Secret Plan To Weaponize Viruses
content:
In a secret speech given to high-level Communist Party cadres nearly two decades ago, Chinese Defense Minister Gen. Chi Haotian explained a long-range plan for ensuring a Chinese national renaissance.
EXCLUSIVE:Â Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It (watch hereÂ Visualizing The Secret History Of Coronavirus)
Watch the exclusive interview ofÂ Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle on Coronavirus Biological WarfareÂ blocked by theÂ Deep State
He said there were three vital issues that must be grasped. The first was the issue of living spaceâ€”because China is severely overpopulated and Chinaâ€™s environment is deteriorating. The second issue, therefore, is that the Communist Party must teach the Chinese people to â€œgo out.â€ By this Gen. Chi meant the conquest of new lands in which a â€œsecond Chinaâ€ could be built by â€œcolonization.â€ From this arises the third vital issue: the â€œissue of America.â€
Gen. Chi warned his listeners: â€œThis appears to be shocking, but the logic is actually very simple.â€ China is â€œin fundamental conflict with the Western strategic interest.â€ Therefore, the United States will never allow China to seize other countries to build a second China. The United States stands in Chinaâ€™s way.
Chi explained the problem as follows: â€œWould the United States allow us to go out to gain new living space? First, if the United States is firm in blocking us, it is hard for us to do anything significant to Taiwan, Vietnam, India, or even Japan, [so] how much more living space can we get? Very trivial! Only countries like the United States, Canada, and Australia have the vast land to serve our need for mass colonization.â€
â€œWe are not as foolish as to want to perish together with America by using nuclear weapons,â€ said the general. â€œOnly by using non-destructive weapons that can kill many people will we be able to reserve America for ourselves.â€ The answer is found in biological weapons. â€œOf course,â€ he added, â€œwe have not been idle, in the past years we have seized the opportunity to master weapons of this kind.â€
The ruling Chinese Communist Party considers biological weapons to be the most important weapons for accomplishing their goal of â€œcleaning up America.â€ Chi credits Deng Xiaoping with putting biological weapons ahead of all other weapon systems in the Chinese arsenal: â€œWhen Comrade Xiaoping was still with us, the Party Central Committee had the perspicacity to make the right decision not to develop aircraft carrier groups and focus instead on developing lethal weapons that can eliminate mass populations of the enemy country.â€
#FrankPlummer â€“ renowned Winnipeg based Canadian National Microbiology Laboratory scientist key to #Coronavirus investigation has died in mysterious conditions in Africa. He was the one who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample which was smuggled to Wuhanhttps://t.co/VjvQMURTyT
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) February 6, 2020

It may seem difficult to believe, but Gen. Chi considered himself to be a â€œhumanitarianâ€ communist, and therefore admitted to mixed personal feelings on this matter: â€œI sometimes think how cruel it is for China and the United States to be enemies. â€¦â€ After all, he noted, the United States helped China in World War II. Chinese people remember that the United States opposed Japanese imperialism. But none of that matters now.
â€œIn the long run,â€ said Gen. Chi, â€œthe relationship of China and the United States is one of a life-and-death struggle.â€ This tragic situation must be accepted. According to Gen. Chi, â€œWe must not forget that the history of our civilization repeatedly has taught us that one mountain does not allow two tigers to live together.â€
According to Gen. Chi, Chinaâ€™s overpopulation problem and environmental degradation will eventually result in social collapse and civil war. General Chi estimated that â€œmore than 800 millionâ€ Chinese would die in such a collapse. Therefore, the Chinese Communist Party has no policy alternative.
Either the United States is â€œcleaned upâ€ by biological attacks, or China suffers national catastrophe.
Chi makes the following argument: â€œWe must prepare ourselves for two scenarios. If our biological weapons succeed in the surprise attack, the Chinese people will be able to keep their losses at a minimum in the fight against the United States. If, however, the attack fails and triggers a nuclear retaliation from the United States, China would perhaps suffer a catastrophe in which more than half of its population would perish. That is why we need to be ready with air defense systems for our big and medium-sized cities.â€
In his speech, Gen. Chi provides us with a key for understanding Chinaâ€™s development strategy. According to Chi, â€œOur economic development is all about preparing for the needs of war!â€ Itâ€™s not about improving the life of Chinese people in the short run. Itâ€™s not about building a consumer-oriented capitalist society. â€œPublicly, said Gen, Chi, â€œwe still emphasize economic development as our center, but in reality, economic development has war as its center!â€
The same can be said for Chinaâ€™s intense interest in the biological sciences.
Weaponizing Viruses
The West has yet to grasp the underlying motive for Chinaâ€™s ready participation in the Westâ€™s P4 microbiology labs, where the worldâ€™s most deadly microbes are studied (i.e., pathogen lethality level 4 labs). This now bubbles to the surface in theÂ novel coronavirusÂ pandemic that has occurred inÂ Wuhan, at the heart of China, just outside Chinaâ€™s principle P4 virology lab (specializing in deadly viruses).
Not long after delivering his speech, Gen. Chi stepped down as Defense Minister in 2003, the same year as theÂ SARSÂ (coronavirus) outbreak in China. This was also (coincidentally) the same year Beijing decided to build the Wuhan P4 virology lab. Given Gen. Chiâ€™s speech, is the novel coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan an accident occasioned by weaponizing the virus at the cityâ€™s P4 microbiology lab?
Three data points are worth considering. First, in 2008 Taiwanâ€™s top security official told lawmakers that â€œTaiwan had intelligence linking the SARS virus to research done in Chinese labs,â€ according to the Sydney Morning Herald. Given Chinaâ€™s economic clout and political infiltration of Chinese-language media, itâ€™s not surprising that National Security Bureau Director Tsai Chao-ming was forced to retract his statement, which had none of the usual features of a â€œgaffe.â€ Was Director Tsai forced to retract a statement that was true, since he could not reveal his intelligence sources inside China?
The second data point worth considering: The Virology Journal has anÂ articleÂ by Gulfaraz Khan, published on Feb. 28, 2013, outlining the discovery of a novel coronavirus in Saudi Arabia in June 2012. Yes, itâ€™s the very same coronavirus with the following difference: When first discovered it couldnâ€™t be readily transmitted from human to human. Something changed in the virus since that time. Thus, the Wuhan version is labeled 2019-nCoV instead of simply NCoV. The latter is not contagious, while the former is spreading rapidly through China as these words are written.
What do you suppose changed its transmissibility between 2012 and 2020? Random mutation or weaponization? (This question has now been answered by Indian scientists who discovered Coronavirus was engineered with HIV AIDS like insertions.) If the current lethal outbreak had occurred in any other city than Wuhan, we might be inclined to believe in a random mutation. But Wuhan is ground zero for Chinese bioweapons. Should we credit such a coincidence?
The third data point worth considering: the journalÂ GreatGameIndiaÂ has published a piece titled â€œCoronavirus Bioweapon â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It.â€

How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized Ithttps://t.co/tc7W2DrmAA
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) January 27, 2020

The authors were clever enough to put Khanâ€™s Virology Journal article together with news of a security breach by Chinese nationals at the Canadian (P4) National Microbiology Lab in Winnipeg, where the novel coronavirus was allegedly stored with other lethal organisms. Last May, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police were called in to investigate; by late July the Chinese were kicked out of the facility. The chief Chinese scientist (Dr. Xiangguo Qiu) was allegedly making trips between Winnipeg and Wuhan.

title: Indian Scientists Discover Coronavirus Engineered With HIV (AIDS) Like Insertions
content:
A group of Indian scientists have discovered that Wuhan Coronavirus has been engineered with AIDS like insertions. The study concludes that it is unlikely for a virus to have acquired such unique insertions naturally in a short duration of time. Meanwhile, China has started using AIDS drug for Coronavirus treatment.
EXCLUSIVE:Â Coronavirus BioweaponÂ â€“ How China Stole Coronavirus From Canada And Weaponized It (watch hereÂ Visualizing The Secret History Of Coronavirus)
Watch the exclusive interview ofÂ Bioweapons Expert Dr. Francis Boyle on Coronavirus Biological WarfareÂ blocked by theÂ Deep State
Note: Authors of â€œuncannyâ€ 2019-nCoV preprint have voluntarily withdrawn the preprint: â€œIt was not our intention to feed into the conspiracy theoriesâ€¦we appreciate the criticismsâ€¦ and will get back with a revised versionâ€
Authors of disputed â€œuncannyâ€ 2019-nCoV preprint to voluntarily withdraw preprint:"It was not our intention to feed into the conspiracy theoriesâ€¦we appreciate the criticismsâ€¦and will get back with a revised versionâ€ https://t.co/zGcT1440D0
â€” Richard Sever  â“Š (@cshperspectives) February 1, 2020


Indian Scientists Discover Coronavirus Engineered With AIDS Like InsertionsThe study was undertaken by scientists from Indian Institute of Technology, Acharya Narendra Dev College and University of Delhi and has been published under the titleÂ Uncanny similarity of novel inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag.
The study found 4 new AIDS like insertions in the Coronavirus which were absent from other Coronaviruses. This finding the study states is â€œunlikely to be fortuitous in natureâ€, meaning that it is not a naturally occurring phenomenon.
We are currently witnessing a major epidemic caused by the 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV). The evolution of 2019-nCoV remains elusive. We found 4 insertions in the spike glycoprotein (S) which are unique to the 2019-nCoV and are not present in other coronaviruses. Importantly, amino acid residues in all the 4 inserts have identity or similarity to those in the HIV-1 gp120 or HIV-1 Gag.
Interestingly, despite the inserts being discontinuous on the primary amino acid sequence, 3D-modelling of the 2019-nCoV suggests that they converge to constitute the receptor binding site. The finding of 4 unique inserts in the 2019-nCoV, all of which have identity /similarity to amino acid residues in key structural proteins of HIV-1 is unlikely to be fortuitous in nature. This work provides yet unknown insights on 2019-nCoV and sheds light on the evolution and pathogenicity of this virus with important implications for diagnosis of this virus.
The scientists were surprised to observe such insertions and were startled â€œas it is quite unlikely for a virus to have acquired such unique insertions naturally in a short duration of timeâ€.
Since the S protein of 2019-nCoV shares closest ancestry with SARS GZ02, the sequence coding for spike proteins of these two viruses were compared using MultiAlin software. We found four new insertions in the protein of 2019-nCoV- â€œGTNGTKRâ€ (IS1), â€œHKNNKSâ€ (IS2), â€œGDSSSGâ€ (IS3) and â€œQTNSPRRAâ€ (IS4). 
To our surprise, these sequence insertions were not only absent in S protein of SARS but were also not observed in any other member of the Coronaviridae family (Supplementary figure). This is startling as it is quite unlikely for a virus to have acquired such unique insertions naturally in a short duration of time.
The study concludes that it is because of these 4 new AIDS like insertions that Wuhan Coronavirus has jumped to humans originally known only to infect animals.
These proteins are critical for the viruses to identify and latch on to their host cells and for viral assembly. Since surface proteins are responsible for host tropism, changes in these proteins imply a change in host specificity of the virus. According to reports from China, there has been a gain of host specificity in case 2019-nCoV as the virus was originally known to infect animals and not humans but after the mutations, it has gained tropism to humans as well.
The study gives credence to GreatGameIndiaâ€˜s earlier reports on Coronavirus Bioweapon. Meanwhile, China has started using AIDS drugs for Coronavirus treatment. China is using AbbVie Incâ€™s HIV drugs as an ad-hoc treatment for pneumonia caused by the novel coronavirus while the global search for a cure continues.
#FrankPlummer â€“ renowned Winnipeg based Canadian National Microbiology Laboratory scientist key to #Coronavirus investigation has died in mysterious conditions in Africa. He was the one who received Saudi SARS Coronavirus sample which was smuggled to Wuhanhttps://t.co/VjvQMURTyT
â€” GreatGameIndia (@GreatGameIndia) February 6, 2020

The Beijing branch of Chinaâ€™s National Health Commission said that a combination of lopinavir and ritonavir, sold under the brand name Kaletra by AbbVie, is part of its latest treatment plan for patients infected by the virus, which has killed at least 56 people in China and sickened more than 2,000 worldwide.
The NHC said that while there is not yet any effective anti-viral drug, it recommends patients are given two lopinavir and ritonavir tablets twice a day and a dose of alpha-interpheron through nebulization twice daily.
Medical journal Lancet said on Friday that a clinical trial is under way using ritonavir and lopinavir to treat cases of the new coronavirus. Meanwhile, Chinaâ€™s Center for Disease Control and Prevention will start developing a vaccine, according to the Global Times.
Wang Guangfa, a respiratory expert at Peking University First Hospital in Beijing who was infected by the virus after visiting Wuhan to inspect to coronavirus patients, told China News Week earlier this week that his doctor recommended he take the HIV drugs to fight the new virus and they worked on him.

A group of Indian scientists have discovered that Wuhan Coronavirus has been engineered with AIDS like insertions. The study concludes that it is unlikely for a virus to have acquired such unique insertions naturally in a short duration of time.
TheÂ studyÂ was undertaken by scientists from Indian Institute of Technology, Acharya Narendra Dev College and University of Delhi and has been published under the titleÂ Uncanny similarity of novel inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag.
TheÂ study foundÂ 4 new AIDS like insertions in the Coronavirus which were absent from other Coronaviruses. This finding theÂ study statesÂ is â€œunlikely to be fortuitous in natureâ€, meaning that it is not a naturally occurring phenomenon.
The scientists wereÂ surprised to observe such insertions and were startled â€œas it is quite unlikely for a virus to have acquired such unique insertions naturally in a short duration of timeâ€. TheÂ study concludesÂ that it is because of these 4 new AIDS like insertions that Wuhan Coronavirus has jumped to humans originally known only to infect animals.
The study gives credence toÂ GreatGameIndiaâ€˜s earlier reports onÂ Coronavirus Bioweapon.

title: Uncanny similarity of unique inserts in the 2019-nCoV spike protein to HIV-1 gp120 and Gag

Prashant Pradhan, Ashutosh Kumar Pandey, Akhilesh Mishra, Parul Gupta, Praveen Kumar Tripathi, Manoj Balakrishnan Menon, James Gomes, Perumal Vivekanandan and Bishwajit Kundu, Kusuma School of biological sciences, Indian Institute of Technology, New Delhi-110016, India.
